description: Takes a user-uploaded image and regenerates it in Lyzr's brand style using the company's color palette (deep purples, vibrant blues, electric accents, clean gradients) and modern tech-forward aesthetic inspired by www.lyzr.ai. Outputs a styled image.

example_response.transformation_description: Description of how the image was transformed to match Lyzr brand style
example_response.style_elements_applied: List of Lyzr brand style elements applied to the image
example_response.color_palette_used: The specific Lyzr brand colors used in the transformation
